name: Aim Trainer (NickGamesDev)
description:
Description

This aim trainer is a repetitive game, where your focus is to develop you aim! The "aim" for this game is to shoot the targets, after being hit, your accuracy will be scored! As they are hit, they will move around! Try to score as high as possible in the 1 minute time! Targets are randomised to keep you on your toes!

Aim trainer is a first person shooter. This game was designed as part of a University Project. This was created in OpenGL, using C++.  Further developments on this game are currently being made, such as difficulty modes, sensitivity changes and more! Feedback would be appreciated! 

Object loader/Shaders used in this game - LearnOpenGL

Features
  • Randomised Generation of targets!
  • With 3 different scoring points, accuracy matters!
  • Try and try again to beat your old score!
  • Functional Lighting and Shading!
Controls
  •  W A S D   >>>  Move Forward, Left, Backwards & Right
  • Mouse Movement >>> Aim
  • "Left Click"  >>> Shoot
  • ESC  >>> Leave Game
Download

Download for Windows

  • Unzip File.
  • Open "Aim Trainer" Folder
  • Run "Aim Trainer.exe".
  • Enjoy Better Aim, to Better Game!
